alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:29AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Mitchell and southern Jewell Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 629 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cawker City, or 17 miles northwest of Beloit, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Glen Elder around 635 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Beloit, Jewell, Randall and Scottsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for north central Kansas.
